definition: building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: The inside of the empty Hayden Planetarium dome.
sentences.chinese: 對空海登天文館圓頂內。

sentences.english: The clock is now controlled by a high grade quartz clock in the main entrance of the Observatory.
sentences.chinese: 此鍾現由位於天文館主入口處的高頻石英鐘控制。

sentences.english: And the Cambodians have actually controlled the Hayden Planetarium from their high school.
sentences.chinese: 柬埔寨人通過他們的高中實際上可以控制海登天文館。

sentences.english: Its flat roof is broken only by the shallow dome of a planetarium beneath.
sentences.chinese: 平屋頂裏面是可以上下移動的天文館圓頂。

sentences.english: Katsushika City Museum is the museum of local history and astronomy.
sentences.chinese: 葛飾區鄉土天文館是一所地方歷史博物館和天文館。

sentences.english: Katsushika City Museum is the museum of local history and astronomy.
sentences.chinese: 葛飾區鄉土天文館是一所地方歷史博物館和天文館。

sentences.english: The motions of the stars can be approximated in a planetarium.
sentences.chinese: 星星的運動可在天文館裏模擬。

definition: to stay/to remain/to linger/(computing) to reside/resident (program etc)
Machia township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Xinyi or Hsinyi district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Hsini district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
person in charge of a place that ends in 園|园, such as a vineyard 葡萄園|葡萄园, zoo 動物園|动物园, cemetery 陵園|陵园 etc
merry-go-round/carousel/Carousel, South Korean TV soap opera
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
